channel.title: Mandy on Transcripts of Iriss.fm
channel.description: Recent content in Mandy on Transcripts of Iriss.fm

item.title: PAssport to Independent Living
item.description: MD - Michelle Drumm LS - Lilian Smith SL - Sharon Ledger M - Mandy L - Lizzie S - Susan Y - Yvonne A - Alison MD 31st of October 2017 marked the launch of PAssport to Independent Living, a published collection of stories written by Personal Assistants about their experiences of what it’s like to work as a Personal Assistant in Scotland, and to raise awareness of self-directed support.
